title: How to Write Negative Infinity (∞) on an Android Calculator

steps.headline: Bring the extra menu on the screen.
Use the Log (Logarithm) option on the extra menu.
steps.description: Close the Extra Menu after using log.

text: Open the calculator.  Bring the extra menu on the screen.  Use the Log (Logarithm) option on the extra menu. Close the Extra Menu after using log. Type 0 (zero) after it.  Press Equals to (=) after it. Watch the answer. See the answer: "-∞".
sentences: Bring the extra menu on the screen.
Use the Log (Logarithm) option on the extra menu.
Close the Extra Menu after using log.
